lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur defender Toby Alderweireld could return from a knee injury when they host Swansea City in the Premier League on Saturday, manager Mauricio Pochettino has said.

headline.print_headline: Tottenham's Alderweireld Nearing First-Team Return, Says Pochettino
headline.main: Tottenham's Alderweireld Nearing First-Team Return, Says Pochettino

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur defender Toby Alderweireld could return from a knee injury when they host Swansea City in the Premier League on Saturday, manager Mauricio Pochettino has said....
